  • Uses of ObjectiveCard in it.polimi.ingsw.Model

    Subclasses of ObjectiveCard in it.polimi.ingsw.Model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ObjectiveCard1
    ObjectiveCard1 represents the first type of objectives, those that add points to your score when positional requirements are satisfied.
    class 
    ObjectiveCard2
    ObjectiveCard2 represents the second type of objective, those that add points to your score if the number of resources required is present on your game board.
